resources.string: lon pi poki pi jan utala
o sona e nimi pi ma musi
nanpa insa kepeken kule walo li %s
nanpa insa kepeken kule neko li %s
sina sona e nimi pi ma lili pi supa musi la, ni li suli mute tan ni:
lipu sona pi musi pi jan lawa moli li kepeken mute e \"nasin toki pi sona nanpa\".
sina sona e \"toki pi musi pi jan lawa moli\" la, sina ken toki pona e musi tawa jan pona sina.
sina sona e nimi ma la, sina ken lukin sona e musi kepeken wawa suli.
nimi ma li lon musi supa. o pilin e ma ni. o pali e ni lon kama mute lon tenpo Sekunta 30!
